n:feed.name: Programmes
n:feed.title: Start here for programmes metadata: Brands, Series, Episodes and Clips

n:filter.name: audio_described
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are audio-described

n:option.title: filter for programmes that are audio-described
filter for programmes that are not audio-described

n:filter.name: availability
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have availability

n:option.title: filter for programmes that are available
filter for programmes that are expected to become available imminently

n:filter.name: availability_entity_type
n:filter.title: additional filter when availability=available

n:option.title: filter for programmes with available episodes
filter for programmes with available clips

n:filter.name: availability_from
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are available after or at the specified datetime

n:filter.name: availability_to
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are available before the specified datetime

n:filter.name: children_of
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have PID as immediate parent

n:filter.name: descendants_of
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have PID as ancestor

n:filter.name: duration
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have given duration

n:option.title: filter for programmes that have short duration (< 5m)
filter for programmes that have medium duration (5m - 30m)
filter for programmes that have long duration (> 30m)

n:filter.name: entity_type
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that have given entity type

n:option.title: filter for programmes that are brands
filter for programmes that are series
filter for programmes that are episodes
filter for programmes that are clips

n:filter.name: format
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with format

n:filter.name: genre
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with genre

n:filter.name: group
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes which belong to the given group pid

n:filter.name: initial_letter
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with title beginning with initial letter librarian style (ignoring leading 'The', 'An' (Welsh), etc) 0-9 a-z

n:filter.name: initial_letter_end
n:filter.title: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/before given letter. Use with initial_letter_start for a range

n:filter.name: initial_letter_start
n:filter.title: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/after given letter. Use with initial_letter_end for range.

n:filter.name: initial_letter_stop
n:filter.title: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/before given letter. Use with initial_letter_start for a range

n:filter.name: initial_letter_strict
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with title beginning with initial letter

n:filter.name: item
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with linked to versions which have the given item pids

n:filter.name: master_brand
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with master_brand

n:filter.name: media_set
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with media set

n:filter.name: media_type
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with media type

n:option.title: filter for programmes that are audio only
filter for programmes that are video only

n:filter.name: page
n:filter.title: which page of results to return

n:filter.name: page_size
n:filter.title: number of results in each page

n:filter.name: partner_id
n:filter.title: filter for programmes by partner ID

n:filter.name: partner_pid
n:filter.title: filter for programmes by partner PID

n:filter.name: people
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with contributions by given people PID

n:filter.name: pid
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes having given PID

n:filter.name: promoted_for
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes which are promoted for given service

n:filter.name: q
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

n:filter.name: signed
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are signed

n:option.title: filter for programmes that are signed
filter for programmes regardless of signedness
filter for programmes that are not signed

n:filter.name: tag_name
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with tag

n:filter.name: tag_scheme
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with a tag

n:filter.name: tleo
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes that are TLEOs

n:option.title: filter for programmes that are TLEOs
filter for programmes that are not TLEOs

n:filter.name: version
n:filter.title: filter for subset of programmes with given PID as one of their versions

n:sort.name: group_position
n:sort.title: sort numerically by position in group, ascending

n:sort.name: most_popular
n:sort.title: sort numerically by popularity (most popular first)

n:sort.name: pid
n:sort.title: sort alphabetically by PID, descending

n:sort.name: position
n:sort.title: sort numerically by position, ascending

n:sort.name: promotion
n:sort.title: sort by promotion rank, ascending

n:sort.name: release_date
n:sort.title: sort chronologically by release date, descending

n:sort.name: relevance
n:sort.title: sort by weighting of search term (use with q parameter)

n:sort.name: scheduled_start
n:sort.title: sort chronologically by scheduled start time/date, ascending

n:sort.name: strict_title
n:sort.title: sort alphabetically by title, ascending

n:sort.name: title
n:sort.title: sort by title librarian style (ignoring leading 'The', 'A', etc), ascending

n:sort.name: tree
n:sort.title: sort by root pid and then preorder tree sort. Requires entities to have release date.

n:sort.name: views
n:sort.title: sort numerically by number of views (most popular first - faster most_popular)

n:mixin.name: ancestor_titles
n:mixin.title: mixin to return ancestor programme titles

n:mixin.name: availability
n:mixin.title: mixin to return programme availability information

n:mixin.name: contributions
n:mixin.title: mixin to return information about contributors to a programme

n:mixin.name: duration
n:mixin.title: mixin to return original version duration in programme concept entities

n:mixin.name: genre_groups
n:mixin.title: mixin to return list of genre groups

n:mixin.name: images
n:mixin.title: mixin to add image information for a programme

n:mixin.name: people
n:mixin.title: mixin to return information about contributors to a programme

n:mixin.name: previous_next
n:mixin.title: mixin to return the programmes which appear before and after a programme (as determined by the sort applied in the request)

n:mixin.name: related_links
n:mixin.title: mixin to return information about related links to a programme

n:mixin.name: titles
n:mixin.title: mixin to return ancestor programme titles

n:feed.name: Availability
n:feed.title: Discover details of on-demand availability for programmes and their versions

n:filter.title: filter for subset of availabilities

n:option.title: filter for availabilities that are available

n:filter.name: descendants_of
n:filter.title: filter for subset of availabilities that have PID as ancestor

n:filter.name: media_set
n:filter.title: filter for subset of availabilities with media set

n:filter.name: page
n:filter.title: which page of results to return

n:filter.name: page_size
n:filter.title: number of results in each page

n:filter.name: partner_pid
n:filter.title: filter for programmes by partner PID

n:filter.name: territory
n:filter.title: filter for availabilities in given territory

n:option.title: filter for only UK availabilities
filter for only non-UK availabilities
filter for global availabilities

n:sort.name: scheduled_start
n:sort.title: sort chronologically by scheduled start time/date, ascending

n:filter.name: people
n:filter.title: filter for subset of broadcasts that have given contributor

n:filter.name: pid
n:filter.title: filter for subset of broadcasts having given PID

n:filter.name: q
n:filter.title: filter for subset of broadcasts matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

n:filter.name: schedule_day
n:filter.title: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on the specified day (BBC time)

n:filter.title: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on or after the specified day (BBC time)
